title: Drawing for the house for 'The Pancake Eater'
marks: Signature; Date LR, in red graphite: [Red Grooms 1980]
description: Frame for the interior image; a stone window seen from the outside, surrounded by disquieting imagery--a barrel full of human bones LR, a body visible from behind some shrubs in the foreground, a roof covered in vines and ravens
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of funds from The Northern Star Foundation and The Hersey Foundation
